products.title: Huawei MateBook X Pro
products.description: The Huawei MateBook X Pro is our pick for the best laptop money can buy in 2018. This is a gorgeously-designed laptop with a stunning screen (albeit with a rather odd aspect ratio), and it comes packed with cutting edge components that allows it to perform brilliantly, and a battery life that runs rings around many of its rivals. It also has a very competitive price, giving you features, design and performance for quite a bit less money.

products.title: Dell XPS 13
products.description: The Dell XPS 13 is an absolutely brilliant laptop. The 2018 version rocks an 8th-generation Intel Core i5 or i7 processor and a bezel-less ‘Infinity Edge’ display, this Dell XPS 13 continues to be the most popular Windows laptop in the world. What’s more, there’s a wide range of customization options, so you can really make the Dell XPS 13 the best laptop for your needs.

products.title: Asus ZenBook Flip S
products.description: The distinctive ZenBook Flip S13 combines elegant sophistication with an all-new design that makes it more desirable than ever. Its sleek slim-bezel NanoEdge touchscreen and 360° ErgoLift hinge make ZenBook Flip S13 ultra-compact and ultra-versatile, and the 11th Generation Intel® Core™ processor and Intel® Iris® Xe graphics deliver effortless performance for on-the-go productivity and creativity. ZenBook Flip S13 brings you flexibility and performance — with a touch of luxury.
